name: The Spun Candy Easter Dolls - Custom Made To Your Liking
description:
*** Each Signature Spun Candy Doll purchased is delightfully OOAK. You may choose her eye and hair style/color, and Melissa will do the rest. We guarantee you'll love her ***

This listing is for ONE Doll ...please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery**

The hair is made from wool felt and is set off with two perfect little pigtails adored with ribbons Their darling dresses are two-piece outfits (with removable skirt) and are made from designer cotton fabric from Melissa's own personal stash collection. They are finished off at the bottom with sweet, wool felt shoes. Their faces are hand-stitched and detailed with darling eyes and sweet rosy cheeks. :) The measure 18 inches from head to toe. Includes a darling pair of removable bunny ears <3

The Signature Spun Candy Dolls are a great size for smaller children to carry around and will easily fit into a small bag or backpack. They make the perfect, quiet, little friend for a long road trip, a day in bed or even just sitting in front of the TV. Each doll created will most surely be loved and light up the face of whomever she gets to belong to.

PLEASE NOTE ** Our Dolls are made with buttons and other small materials that may not be suitable for children under the age of 3.

Please message Melissa with any questions you have.
